about_the_game:
Need a bit more flavor in your RTP? Gyrowolf has you covered.

Gyrowolf brings classic RPG-styled music to life with 27 tracks designed to fit in with traditional RPGs as well as the RPG Maker RTP.

This pack contains:
  • Tunes for battle, dungeon exploration, towns, and more
  • Variety of styles and intensities so you can find a song to fit your mood
  • Blends well with the default RTP, yet unique enough to stand out on its own
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects
